page.title: 19EDUCATION
page.content: Education in our area comprises of nursery (3-5 years), primary (5-11 years) and secondary school (11-16). Playgroups run by a variety of different sources (council, private) also exist for the under 5,s our school , Grinling Gibbons , runs a weekly mother - toddler group for under 3,s. Most of the school are controlled by the inner london education authority though there are one or two fee paying, independent schools in the greenwich area. Secondary schools are comprehensive taking children of all ability ranges. Recent reports published on education include Thomas (primary schools), hargreves (secondary schools), fish (special needs), schools have recenly been asked to consider there anti - racit multi - ethnic policies.
